sense.def:
The exclusion of something from a speech, piece of writing, or activity
je namerna izpustitev nečesa iz govora, zapisa ali dejavnosti.

seg.quote: ...the exclusion of any mention of her good qualities.

sense.def:
Kadar nekomu preprečimo, da bi nekam vstopil ali sodeloval pri neki dejavnosti, to imenujemo
one's exclusion
.

seg.quote: ...the laws relating to the admission and exclusion of aliens.
